name: Thomas Rogers
description: Down to earth, i have a very easy life style, i am a religious person, i have a very large heart for love, I have so much love to give, i am very passionate and romantic.. I like to work out to keep fitness.I am looking for true love, I need a woman that would show me good loving and i am willing to give her back much loving, So what are you waiting for? email me…Am looking for that special someone that God has made for me to love,,,
